text: "Queen Bitch" is a 1971 song by David Bowie. It is the 10th track from his fourth studio album Hunky Dory and plays tribute to the American band The Velvet Underground. In January 1997 on his 50th birthday Bowie performed the song live with Lou Reed. ==References== Category:1971 songs Category:Glam rock songs Category:David Bowie songs
title: Queen Bitch
